Body:
tests = [(90.0, 0.0, 1.0), (-90.0, 0.0, -1.0), (180.0, -1.0, 0.0), (-180.0,
    -1.0, 0.0), (270.0, 0.0, -1.0), (-270.0, 0.0, 1.0), (360.0, 1.0, 0.0),
    (-360.0, 1.0, 0.0), (45.0, HALF_SQRT_2, HALF_SQRT_2), (-45.0,
    HALF_SQRT_2, -HALF_SQRT_2), (315.0, HALF_SQRT_2, -HALF_SQRT_2), (-315.0,
    HALF_SQRT_2, HALF_SQRT_2), (30.0, HALF_SQRT_3, 0.5), (-30.0,
    HALF_SQRT_3, -0.5), (330.0, HALF_SQRT_3, -0.5), (-330.0, HALF_SQRT_3, 0.5)]
for test in tests:
    radius = random.uniform(0.001, 1000.0)
    p = value2D.Point2D(value.ValueUncertainty(radius, 0.25), value.
        ValueUncertainty(0.0, 0.25))
    p.rotate(angle.Angle(degrees=test[0]))
    self.assertAlmostEqual(p.x.raw, radius * test[1], 2)
    self.assertAlmostEqual(p.y.raw, radius * test[2], 2)
